医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
调查显示印度代谢疾病呈上升趋势研究显示，印度非传染性代谢疾病的发病率很高，城乡地区以及印度不同邦之间的患病率存在​​显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Survey-unveils-Indias-rising-tide-of-metabolic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Survey-unveils-Indias-rising-tide-of-metabolic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cef20b4-fb32-404c-9​​7d8-e8c2acd6f794 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Survey unveils India's rising tide of metabolic diseases
分析发现各国 COVID-19 治疗建议存在显着差异开放获取期刊 BMJ 发表的一项比较分析发现，世界各地治疗 COVID-19 的国家临床指南差异很大，资源贫乏的国家最有可能偏离黄金标准（世界卫生组织；WHO）的治疗建议全球健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Analysis-finds-significant-variations-in-national-COVID-19-treatment-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Analysis-finds-significant-variations-in-national-COVID-19-treatment-recommendations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20524a0a-7c4a-4830-8e66-6f231d552594 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 16:02:07 -0400 Analysis finds significant variations in national COVID-19 treatment recommendations
成本成为戒烟努力的重要因素一项发表在《开放获取》上的对全国调查结果的分析发现，在英国，健康问题仍然是一半以上表示想戒烟的人的主要动机，但成本现在是超过四分之一的人的关键因素。 《BMJ 公共卫生》杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Cost-becomes-a-significant-factor-in-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Cost-becomes-a-significant-factor-in-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ffe058e-2e48-446a-af05-ba1769f7b5cb Tue, 23 Apr 2024 15:52:31 -0400 Cost becomes a significant factor in smoking cessation efforts
审查发现现役军人与女性出生体重低的风险之间存在联系对《BMJ 军事健康》杂志在线发表的现有科学证据进行的审查表明，现役军人可能会增加女性生低出生体重婴儿的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Review-finds-link- Between-active-military-service-and-womene28099s-risk-of-having-low-birthweight-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Review-finds-link- Between-active-military-service-and-womene28099s-risk-of-having-low-birthweight-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=105c483d-8536-4ed1-9c57-9b55b334d039 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 15:48:42 -0400 Review finds link between active military service and women’s risk of having low birthweight babies
密歇根大学为六年级学生推出跨专业数字健康课程六年级学生塞拉·伯格曼 (Sera Bergman) 承认，她花了大量时间观看卷轴，并且像大多数同龄的孩子一样享受它。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/UM-launches-interprofessional-digital-wellness-class-for-sixth-graders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/UM-launches-interprofessional-digital-wellness-class-for-sixth-graders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23858b66-cc72-4930-9a88-8bd27b363191 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 14:33:44 -0400 U-M launches interprofessional digital wellness class for sixth graders
营养不良的家庭接触者患结核病的可能性高出三倍结核分枝杆菌是引起结核病 (TB) 的细菌，与大多数细菌不同，它能够在数月甚至数年的时间里默默地感染个体，然后醒来并引起活动性疾病，从而导致严重疾病和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Undernourished-household-contacts-third-times-more-likely-to-develop-TB.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Undernourished-household-contacts-third-times-more-likely-to-develop-TB.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=793d641a-4808-4ab8-8c8e-10d84e16c1b5 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 14:25:43 -0400 Undernourished household contacts three times more likely to develop TB
研究人员旨在利用人工智能进行干眼病的早期筛查和预后干眼病 (DED) 是较常见的眼部疾病之一，影响着世界上高达 30% 的人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Researchers-aim-to-use-AI-for-early-screening-and-prognosis-of-Dry-Eye-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Researchers-aim-to-use-AI-for-early-screening-and-prognosis-of-Dry-Eye-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63ea9e1c-018b-4ef4-9cc2-6ed77fba5c89 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 14:19:40 -0400 Researchers aim to use AI for early screening and prognosis of Dry Eye Disease
中风和心脏病患者发现免疫功能障碍机制德国每年有 250,000 至 300,000 人患有中风或心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Immune-dysfunction-mechanism-discovered-in-中风-and-heart-attack-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Immune-dysfunction-mechanism-discovered-in-中风-and-heart-attack-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3f1ad0a-002c-4078-9b4c-eefb52dcdab1 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 14:14:57 -0400 Immune dysfunction mechanism discovered in stroke and heart attack patients
PCORI 资助超过 1.5 亿美元支持新的以患者为中心的临床有效性研究以患者为中心的结果研究所 (PCORI) 今天宣布批准总额超过 1.5 亿美元的资助，以支持新的以患者为中心的比较临床有效性研究 (CER)、旨在加强以患者为中心的 CER 的严谨性和质量的研究以及一个将 PCORI 资助的研究成果付诸实践的项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/PCORI-funds-more-than-24150-million-to-support-new-patent-centered-clinical-effectness-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/PCORI-funds-more-than-24150-million-to-support-new-patent-centered-clinical-effectness-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1e8944a-0936-4858-bfa1-5b8019b8394b Tue, 23 Apr 2024 13:59:00 -0400 PCORI funds more than $150 million to support new patient-centered clinical effectiveness research
社交媒体信息可能会影响年轻人对精神疾病的看法即使社交媒体信息措辞上的细微差别也可能足以动摇年轻人对抑郁症和焦虑症及其治疗的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Social-media-messages-may-sway-young-peoples-beliefs-about-mental-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Social-media-messages-may-sway-young-peoples-beliefs-about-mental-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0946a5d0-4b37-4302-addf-d9bf4c46d1dc Tue, 23 Apr 2024 13:36:13 -0400 Social media messages may sway young people's beliefs about mental illness
